org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.as.codegen

Class MXMLClassDirectiveProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.as.codegen.MXMLClassDirectiveProcessor

  • public class MXMLClassDirectiveProcessor
extends Object
    MXMLClassDirectiveProcessor is a subclass of ClassDirectiveProcessor that generates an ABC class from an IMXMLClassDefinitionNode and its contents. Here are some register usage conventions for Code Generation: local3: during parts of the constructor, local3 is used for a lookup array of DeferredInstanceFromFunction. local1 and 2: Used during the constructor as temporaries for some data-binding init.

      Collection of static variables with initial values which need to be initialized before other static initialization code.

    • Field Detail

      • globalScope

        protected final LexicalScope globalScope
        The AET lexical scope in which the generated class lives.

      • nodeToIndexMap

        protected Map<IMXMLNode,Integer> nodeToIndexMap
        This keeps track of the entries in our temporary array of DeferredInstanceFromFunction objects that we CG to help with State override CG. Keys are Instance nodes, values are the array index where the deferred instance is: deferred instance = local3[ nodeToIndexMap.get(an instance) ]

      • nodeToInstanceDescriptorMap

        protected Map<IMXMLNode,InstructionList> nodeToInstanceDescriptorMap

      • indexToNodeMap

        protected Map<Integer,IMXMLNode> indexToNodeMap

      • staticVariableInitializers

        protected final Collection<VariableNode> staticVariableInitializers
        Collection of static variables with initial values which need to be initialized before other static initialization code.

    • Method Detail

      • createEventHandlerMethodInfo

        public static MethodInfo createEventHandlerMethodInfo(ICompilerProject project,
                                      IMXMLEventSpecifierNode eventNode,
                                      String handlerName)
        Creates a MethodInfo describing the signature for an autogenerated MXML event handler method corresponding to an MXMLEventSpecifierNode.
        Parameters:
        eventNode - - an MXMLEventSpecifierNode, which is used to determine the type of the 'event' parameter.
        handlerName - - the name for the autogenerated event handler method.
        Returns:
        The MethodInfo specifying the signature of the event handler method.

      • createVectorGeneratorMethodInfo

        public static MethodInfo createVectorGeneratorMethodInfo(ICompilerProject project,
                                         IMXMLVectorNode vectorNode,
                                         String handlerName)
        Creates a MethodInfo describing the signature for an autogenerated vector generator method.
        Parameters:
        vectorNode - - a node, which is used to determine the type of the 'vector'.
        handlerName - - the name for the autogenerated event handler method.
        Returns:
        The MethodInfo specifying the signature of the vector generator method.

        public Name getEventHandlerName(IMXMLEventSpecifierNode eventNode)

        public void declareBindableVariable(VariableNode varNode)

        varNode - - the variable's AST.

        protected void generateInstructions(IASNode node,

        Generate instructions for field initializers or static initialization statements.
        Parameters:
        node - - the AST at the root of the statement.
        isStatic - - true if the code should be generated in a static context.

      • functionTraitKind

        public static int functionTraitKind(FunctionNode func,
                    int default_kind)
        Getter/Setter functions need to be declared with a specific trait kind; do so here.
        Parameters:
        func - - a FunctionNode.
        default_kind - - the trait kind to use if the function is not a getter or setter. Varies depending on caller's context.
        Returns:
        the trait kind to use to declare the input function.
